title: Thanks for nerfing Riven but
body: She doesnt need the Q cd compensation buff. Her shield having 4 seconds increased cooldown is needed but the AD ratio on her shield shouldve gone down from 100% to 80%.

> [{quoted}](name=Ragnaveil,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=liJNOws8,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2019-05-01T15:43:23.942+0000)

Why the fuck would they nerf her any more on top of the massive E nerf?

Riven is already going to be probably unplayable anywhere past diamond with the current changes alone, they are actually killing the champ by almost doubling the CD of one of her most important spells.

She's not gonna be unplayable, idk where that statement came from. She rushes CDR on top of the 5% she gets from Inspiration. Her kit is too net positive in damage for early game that a good Riven player doesn't even worry about her cooldowns. All it means is she's gonna be passive till 6, by then she would have at least two cdr components. 

With the 5% alone, the E will be at a 13.3 second cooldown, much lower than Sylas' two part dash which sits at a whopping 18 seconds. And since she has animation canceling as a part of her kit, its only fair the passive gets hit since that allows her to get her passive hits off much easier and in quicker succession. 

Right now its 25% of her AD, and she can easily hit 90-100 AD like I said, so that gives her 80-90 damage from the auto itself, and a extra 22.5 (round down since armor exists to 22) bonus physical damage on that auto. Thats nuts early game, and thats just one auto out of 3 autos animation canceling can give her. All im saying is, her scalings right now outweigh her negatives for those respective spells, which makes her weaknesses less stronger.
